message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I propose a price of $13500 for the product.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. I propose a price of $13000 for the product. This is my best offer considering the value it holds for you.
I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $11800 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. Considering the value you place on it, I am willing to lower the price to $12500. This is my final offer.
I'm still trying to get as close to my target price as possible. I'm willing to pay $12200 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your desire to stay within your budget. My final offer for the product is $12750. This is the most I can lower the price while still maintaining the value of the product.
I'm getting close to my target price, but I still need to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $12300 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $12550 for the product. This is the lowest price I can go while still ensuring that the product retains its value and quality.
I'm really close to my target price, but I still need to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $12250 for the product. Can you consider this price?
